title: Father and son killed in motorcycle-train collision
body_lines: Two members of the same family died today (April 16) in a fatal collision between a motorcycle and a train on the Weliwatte level crossing in Balapitiya.
A father and son, aged 41 and 15 years respectively, who were on the motorcycle, have been hit by a train on the coastal line.
otorcycle they were riding collided with a train at the level crossing at Balapitiya-Weliwatte.
